Product Title: Smokey and the Bandit (The 7-Movie Outlaw Collection)
Review Date: 2013/11/15
Store: Burt Reynolds  (Actor),     Sally Field  (Actor),     Hal Needham  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy
Product Description: ["Strap yourself in for hours of high-speed high jinks and jaw-dropping fun as Smokey and The Bandit: The 7-Movie Outlaw Collection puts you in the driver's seat of the rowdiest road-movie franchise of all time. With the three original movies that turned Burt Reynolds and CB radios into national obsessions and the four television movies that spread Bandit mania to a whole new generation, this seven-movie, four-disc collection puts every legendary performer, every outrageous stunt, every dadgum catchphrase in the whole Bandit universe into one place—yours!", 'Bonus Content:', 'Disc 1 - Smokey and the Bandit:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 1 - Smokey and the Bandit II:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 2 - Smokey and the Bandit Part 3:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': "DVD Movie, Smokey & the Bandit Part 3, Blu-ray Movie, Bandit Goes Country, Smokey and the Bandit II, Smokey & the Bandit, Bandit, Bandit, Beauty and the Bandit, Bandit's Silver Angel, Smokey & the Bandit II, Comedy, Action & Adventure, Smokey and the Bandit Part 3DVD Movie, Smokey & the Bandit Part 3, Blu-ray Movie, Bandit Goes Country, Smokey and the Bandit II, Smokey & the Bandit, Bandit, Bandit, Beauty and the Bandit, Bandit's Silver Angel, Smokey & the Bandit II, Comedy, Action & Adventure, Smokey and the Bandit Part 3  See more", 'Format': 'Box set, Color, NTSC, Multiple Formats, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Mike Henry, Sally Field, Burt Reynolds, Pat McCormick, Hal Needham, Paul Williams, Jackie Gleason, Jerry ReedMike Henry, Sally Field, Burt Reynolds, Pat McCormick, Hal Needham, Paul Williams, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed  See more', 'Initial release date': '2011-03-13', 'Language': 'Unqualified, English (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1, 1.33:1, 1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.3 x 7.5 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'Item model number': '7986399', 'Director': 'Hal Needham', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '10 hours and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 13, 2011', 'Actors': 'Burt Reynolds, Sally Field, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed, Mike Henry', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '4'}
Review Text: I liked that I can watch all 3 Smokey and the Bandit movies.  All considered classics.  Wish we had more movies like this now.

reference_summary:
American Originals
Various  (Actor),     History  (Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, A&E Home Video, All A&E Titles
["They're a special breed - guys who go to work in the morning never knowing if they'll make it home alive that night. Every day is a struggle just to survive. For the loggers, wedged on a mountainside with behemoth trees, 60-ton machines, and razor-sharp chainsaws, the slightest miscalculation can spell disaster. The ice road truckers, steering gigantic 16-wheelers over frozen roads, face the specter of crashing through the surface, frostbite, or worse. And residents of the forbidding, icy north battle weather and unforgiving terrain just to eke out an existence. They all need every bit of ingenuity, grit, and know-how they can muster just to stay alive at least until the next gig.This adrenaline-pumping collection from HISTORY includes over 20 hours of action from Ax Men, Tougher in Alaska, and the record-breaking series Ice Road Truckers. You'll be awed as you watch these ordinary-seeming men face the kind of daily challenges most of us can't even imagine.Programs per disc:DISC 1: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 1: episodes 1-4DISC 2: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 2: episodes 5-8DISC 3: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 3: episodes 9-10 / bonus materialsDISC 4: Ice Road Truckers: On and Off The IceDISC 5: Dangerous Missions: Suicide Missions of D-Day / Marine Raiders / Forward Observers / PathfindersDISC 6: Dangerous Missions: Rescue Swimmers / Merrill's Marauders / Assault on Iwo Jima / Hostage NegotiatorsDISC 7: Ax Men S1, Vol 1: Man vs. Mountain / Risk and Reward / Storm Season Strikes / The Big HitDISC 8: Ax Men S1, Vol 2: Market Meltdown / Reversal of Fortune / The Close Call / Loggers Under FireDISC 9: Ax Men S1, Vol 3: A Logger's Thanksgiving / Black Friday / Storm of the CenturyDISC 10: Ax Men S1, Vol 4: The Toughest Season / Picking Up The Pieces / The Final HaulDISC 11: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 1: Episodes 1-4DISC 12: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 2: Episodes 5-7DISC 13: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 3: Episodes 8-10DISC 14: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 4: Episodes 11-13"]
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 5.75 x 2.25 inches; 1.5 Pounds', 'Director': 'History', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '37 hours and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 26, 2009', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1)', 'Studio': 'A&E Home Video', 'Number of discs': '14'}
The shows work great and liked the value package to see other shows I haven't.  I got it to see Ax men and Ice road truckers but think its great to see the other shows too.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

The user has a strong preference for documentaries and reality TV involving extreme professions and survival challenges, particularly those that highlight physically demanding and high-risk occupations like logging and ice road trucking. Recently, they expressed an interest in classic comedies and action films by purchasing a boxed set featuring a beloved road-movie franchise. This addition reflects their enjoyment of engaging storytelling and nostalgia for iconic cinema. 

They appreciate comprehensive collections that allow for extended viewing experiences, whether through well-known series or classic films. The user's enjoyment of high-energy, adrenaline-pumping content remains consistent, as they value both diverse programming and value packages that enhance their viewing options.

Keywords reflecting their evolving preferences include: 

- Documentaries
- Reality TV
- Extreme occupations
- Survival challenges
- Classic movies
- Engaging storytelling
- Value packages
- Diverse content
- High-energy action

Overall, the user has consistently demonstrated a preference for high-risk, outdoor-focused reality shows and classic cinematic adventures, valuing the quality and depth of their viewing experiences across various genres. Their high ratings reflect satisfaction with the entertainment value and overall quality of the content.
